help_page.help_desc: Our support team is here to assist. Reach out via phone, email or chat anytime.

faqs.q: How do I find schemes I'm eligible for?
faqs.a: Use the Voice Assistant to describe your situation (e.g., 'I'm a farmer looking for subsidies'), or visit the Schemes page and browse by category. The platform will match you with relevant programs.
We currently support English, Hindi, and Marathi. You can change language from the language selector in the navbar.

faqs.q: How do I check my eligibility?
faqs.a: Click 'Check Eligibility' on any scheme card. Answer simple questions about your income, location, age and occupation. Results are instant.
Yes. Visit the Action Summary page to view your previous queries, matched schemes and next steps. No login required.
We collect minimal personal data and only with your explicit consent. We never share your information with third parties without permission.

faqs.q: How do I apply for a scheme after finding it?
faqs.a: Visit the Application Guide for step-by-step instructions, required documents, and links to official portals or offline application centers.

faqs.q: Can I use this platform on mobile?
faqs.a: Yes. The platform is fully optimized for mobile and works on both iOS and Android browsers.

faqs.q: What if the Voice Assistant doesn't understand me?
faqs.a: Try the text input option instead, or contact our support team. We're continuously improving our voice recognition.

step_guide_page.label: Government Scheme Process
step_guide_page.title: Your Step-by-Step Guide
step_guide_page.description: Follow these essential steps to successfully apply for the government scheme. Each step is carefully designed to ensure smooth processing and timely approval of your application.

steps.title: Check Eligibility Criteria
steps.desc: Verify that you meet all the basic eligibility requirements including age, income, residency, and other scheme-specific criteria.

steps.title: Gather Required Documents
steps.desc: Collect all necessary documents: Aadhar, PAN, address proof, income certificate, caste certificate, and bank account details.

steps.title: Register Online or Offline
steps.desc: Submit your application through the official government portal or visit your nearest Taluka/Block office for offline registration.

steps.title: Application Verification
steps.desc: Your documents will be verified by government officials. You may be contacted for additional information or verification visits.

steps.title: Pay Processing Fee (if applicable)
steps.desc: Pay any mandatory processing fee through online banking, debit card, or at the government office. Keep the receipt for your records.

steps.title: Receive Confirmation & Track Status
steps.desc: You'll receive an acknowledgment receipt and registration number. Use this to track your application status online anytime.

important_notes.title: Important Things to Remember
items: Keep all original documents safe and maintain copies for your records
Save your registration number and acknowledgment receipt carefully
Don't miss any deadlines mentioned in your confirmation letter
Contact the helpline if you face any issues during the process
